article:
'Replacements' or 'The Replacements' may refer to:

*The Replacements (band), an American rock band *''The Replacements'' (film), a
2000 sports comedy *''The Replacements'' (TV series), an American animated
series *"Replacements" (''Band of Brothers''), an episode of the TV series Band
of Brothers *"Replacements" (short story), a story by Lisa Tuttle *Replacements
Ltd., a Greensboro, North Carolina retailer of china, flatware and related items
